Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils

Class CharacteristicBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.CharacteristicBuilder
  • public final class CharacteristicBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class used to create and configure a BluetoothGattCharacteristic to be entered into a BluetoothGattService.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DescriptorBuilder addDescriptor​(java.util.UUID descriptorUuid)
      Add a new BleDescriptor to be added to this BleCharacteristic.
      ServiceBuilder build()
      Build this BleCharacteristic, and add it to it's parent BleService via ServiceBuilder.
      GattDatabase completeService()
      Calls build(), then builds the parent BleService, and add it to the database.
      CharacteristicBuilder newCharacteristic​(java.util.UUID charUuid)
      Calls build(), then creates a new BleCharacteristic.
      CharacteristicPermissions setPermissions()
      Set the permissions for this BleCharacteristic.

    • Method Detail

      • setProperties

        public final CharacteristicBuilder setProperties​(int properties)
        Set this BleCharacteristic's properties. You can also use setProperties(int...), but it's recommended you use setProperties() instead.

      • setProperties

        public final CharacteristicBuilder setProperties​(int... properties)
        Set this BleCharacteristic's properties. You can also use setProperties(int), but it's recommended you use setProperties() instead.

      • setProperties

        public final Properties setProperties()
        Set the properties for this BleCharacteristic.

      • setPermissions

        public final CharacteristicBuilder setPermissions​(int permissions)
        Set this BleCharacteristic's permissions. You can also use setPermissions(int...), but it's recommended you use setPermissions() instead.

      • setPermissions

        public final CharacteristicBuilder setPermissions​(int... permissions)
        Set this BleCharacteristic's permissions. You can also use setPermissions(int), but it's recommended you use setPermissions() instead.

      • setPermissions

        public final CharacteristicPermissions setPermissions()
        Set the permissions for this BleCharacteristic.

      • setValue

        public final CharacteristicBuilder setValue​(byte[] value)
        Set the default value for this BleCharacteristic.

      • addDescriptor

        public final DescriptorBuilder addDescriptor​(java.util.UUID descriptorUuid)
        Add a new BleDescriptor to be added to this BleCharacteristic.

      • build

        public final ServiceBuilder build()
        Build this BleCharacteristic, and add it to it's parent BleService via ServiceBuilder. This is meant to be used when building a GattDatabase.

      • newCharacteristic

        public final CharacteristicBuilder newCharacteristic​(java.util.UUID charUuid)
        Calls build(), then creates a new BleCharacteristic.

      • completeService

        public final GattDatabase completeService()
        Calls build(), then builds the parent BleService, and add it to the database.
